column4: astro2k:_ look at these two websites for backing up your system: http://www.debianhelp.co.uk/ddcommand.htm     http://wiki.linuxquestions.org/wiki/Dd

astro2k:_ you can tell if your install cd is bad by booting to it on startup, and it will give you the option to check for integrity of the cd.....I forgot what they call it, but you will be able to tell by reading the options on starup....I think it just says check cd
it reads information about nVidia and ATI video support only ... but nothing about x3100
